summary: The PlayStation Portable (PSP) is a popular handheld gaming device made by Sony. It was released in 2004 and offered powerful graphics and multimedia features, letting users play games, watch videos, and listen to music. The PSP used special discs called UMDs for games and movies. It competed with Nintendo's DS and was a big success, selling over 80 million units worldwide. Later, it was replaced by the PlayStation Vita.
title: PlayStation Portable
